author: Al Jazeera
title: China bans foreign visitors after imported coronavirus cases rise
description: Beijing takes action to curb surge of infected people arriving from new hotspots overseas, as local cases dwindle.
content:
China will ban entry to all foreigners, including non-nationals with valid visas and residence permits, from midnight on Friday in a move to curb the numbers of imported coronavirus cases.
The other measures announced by the foreign ministry include reducing… [+1787 chars]
